response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique offering is tailored to meet your specific needs and comes with exceptional features that promise unparalleled performance. Given its high-quality craftsmanship and innovative design, we believe its value exceeds $12,000. To ensure we both benefit from this transaction, I propose a special introductory price of $15,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
